post.body: And during heavy snows, shovel your driveway into the back of your truck for more traction. It will thaw the same as the snow.
See if MacTheRipper can put the source on your computer.
You're Welcome. Glad I could help.
It's a Taco Bell night. Mmmmm Nachos
OUCH, and right after I posted. Is there away to list people separately because their tweets are more important to me?
Awesome, that will allow me to keep track of my wife's and daughter's tweets, sometimes they get lost in the mix.
Syncing = 1, I only use one computer. However, multiple Twitter accounts = 10
What are we syncing?
I just bought EventBox from http://thecosmicmachine.com/ keep up the great work. I look forward to the iPhone EvenBox too.
We have LED christmas tree lights this year. Blinding at the right angle.
In 2005 I changed every (sans stove, fridge and garage door opener) bulb in my house from incancesdents to compact fluorescents.
But does it taste better than sweet digital revenge?
Don't bother, it's not worth it.
You're full of "Sugar Honey Ice Tea"
And I never got see Macworld in person. I think not having a known date for possible releases will be good for business.
Always run Combo and do restart first.
Yell, "BOMB". Ok don't really do that.
Obviously it means "and a smile". Have a Coke and a smile and try again.
Where's my Qik application, why do you have it, what's so special about you? Oh Yeah, you're Cali Lewis. My Bad.
I only do combo updates. And I keep the combo updaters on my keychain flash drive. Never know when I'll need 2 update someone else
I picked up a case of the k-cup cocoa.
Try some Cocoa.
Congrats, I got Karen the Keurig Platinum. And a few accessories.
Feature request, I would like to be able to see what app people tweet from. Makes me feel like I know if they're at work or mobile
If U offer a free application with just DIGG, then maybe that gives you the opportunity to include it in EventBox. No DIGG profit.
That's just proof that celebrities are still getting theirs while the government gives ours away to companies we don't buy from
TheMacJedi is currently Online: Playing Netflix Watching a movie. Watching a movie. (via Xbox Live Nation)
At my fifth stop of the day, only one more to go.
Xbox Live: themacjedi is currently Offline. Last seen 44 minutes ago playing Xbox 360 Dashboard (via Xbox Live Nation)
TheMacJedi is currently Away: Last seen 34 minutes ago playing Xbox 360 Dashboard (via Xbox Live Nation)
Just finished watching, Look Who's Talking, with the family. I forgot how funny it was. 1989 wasn't that long ago, was it?
TheMacJedi is currently Online: Playing Netflix Watching a movie. Watching a movie. (via Xbox Live Nation)
I'm off to work. No PCs today, hopefully.
Just finished watching, Children of Men. It was OK, nothing I'd ever want to see again. Thank you Netflix DVD.
My Mom's 57th birthday gift http://twitpic.com/thfe
In Mom's Music while my daughter Allyson has voice lessons. http://twitpic.com/tf3m
My fingers are cold, I hate the cold. The cold's only purpose is to remind me how much I like the heat. You can go away now cold, I get it.
If you're using Suitcase Fusion (12.1.7) and Suitcase Fusion 2 (13.0.1) don't upgrade to 10.5.6 just yet. http://extensis.com for more info.
After Brisco was de-matted, raked heavily, washed and brushed he looks about 10% smaller.
Brisco getting his 15 year makeover. http://twitpic.com/te4m
Got my coffee @Starbucks, I hate the cold.
Watching, Surface, on Netflix. Netflix is almost better than cable TV. I'm enjoying this show as much as I did the first time.
My daughter is becoming a WordPress pro at age 11. Let's see how quickly she adapts to WordPress 2.7
Just had dinner at The Spaghetti Shop. Mmmm pasta.
Voice search in new Google app is awesome. Seriously, you should never be lost again.
Computer is rebooting into 10.5.6
Just finished watching, Uncle Buck, with the family. Allyson didn't think she would like it but did. Party song was "Bust a Move", funny.
I scored 1,419,000 points in Lips singing "Bust a Move". This game is lots of fun.
We're having a blast with the new Xbox 360 game Lips. The mics, songs, videos and game are top notch. Very well made. "Now Bust a Move!"
Netflix Instant, "Episode available on disc only". Whose idea was that? I'm not interested in seasons with missing episodes. Season removed.
I'm off to bed after playing Midnight Club LA with Stephen.
The LogMeIn iPhone app is awesome. I've been using LMI for about 2 yrs now and now I can provide live service when I normally couldn't have.
Just finished watching, Bruce & Lloyd Out of Control, with the family. Good but not nearly as funny as Get Smart.
Just finished watching, Get Smart, with the family. Hilarious movie. I'll watch it again. Everyone loved it.
I waiting for a new Xbox model before buying my second 360. I want a huge hard drive and motion controller.
Just finished season 2 of Jeremiah. It was good enough that I would like to see more. But that's it.
Only one more episode of Jeremiah left to watch from season 2. Season 2 is much better than season 1. I've quite enjoyed this show.
Look at me in a Santa hat, or whatever that thing is called.
Just finished watching, ELF, with the family. Always makes me laugh. Great movie, especially this time of the year.
Let it be known that I do not interfere with a "Set Heart".
